name: wrap
label: Wrap Deformer
description: Multi-threaded wrap deformer for maya with rebind capabilities and custom octree for faster bind. Developped at Mikros Animation and  used on several feature films.

name: collide
label: Collision Deformer
description: Multi-threaded collision deformer for maya. Developped at Mikros Animation and  used on several feature films.

name: wire
label: Wire Deformer
description: Multi-threaded wire deformer for maya. Developped at Mikros Animation and  used on several feature films.
